name: ACCELERATE Time Relativity
description:
Specially made to SPEEDRUN  Play it at Night

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Controls
  • Mouse cursor = Player direction
  • Hold Left Click = Accelerate

You have to be close to the black hole to increase the speed with which the years pass on planet earth.

If you touch one high-time dilatation object, this is what would happen:

Years will pass on earth, but for you thus were only seconds.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Adaptation

I adapted the theme Too Long as a form of time.

Taking the point of view: "Time is relative"

Time passes slower if you are for example in a black hole than if you were standing on planet earth.

The story is about some organisms which do not have long to live, due to a rare disease.

And a cure is YEARS away "too much time" from being developed.

So you are ordered to take those organisms into a black hole and wait until scientists develop a cure on planet earth.

"The main idea of the game is possible to recreate it in real life"

I decided to give it a touch of horror because time dilation is real, it exists and is "happening" right now.

Time is relative

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
